desc: The OG Soda Reimagined! We reimagined the nostalgic soda flavors you grew up loving and canned them with functional ingredients to give you a guilt free beverage which not only tastes good but also feels goooood! Low Sugar Beverage | Low Calorie Soda | Supports Relaxation w/ L-Theanine and Ashwagandha

layout.text:
✓ Supports Relaxation
✓ Delicious Taste
✓ Only 6g sugar & 30-50 Calories
